facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2009, 25.3 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 decreased from 4.7 % in 2006 to 3.0% in 2009.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 1210 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 732 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 173.3 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 127.2 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex and age (per 1,000 uninfected population)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , there were about 0.03 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 24.1 % in 2000 to 21.8% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2006, 45.3 % of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 8 % in 2006 to 24.3636% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 14.08523 % of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation service - a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 5.50 % in 2000 to 29.89% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , less than 5 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 3.45303 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 2.65833 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita was -1.08 % in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 65.52 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums was 73.6 % in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 29.5138683319092 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 3.45303 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 2.65833 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest declined from 11.97915 % in 2000 to 10.14283% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 0 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 0 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , the intentional homicide rate was 4.31 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2006 , there were about 3 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.66 % of the population .
